titles.title: Recognizing that allowing illegal immigrants and noncitizens the right to vote devalues the franchise and diminishes the voting power of United States citizens.
Recognizing that allowing illegal immigrants and noncitizens the right to vote devalues the franchise and diminishes the voting power of United States citizens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes that allowing illegal immigrants and noncitizens the right to vote devalues the franchise and diminishes the voting power of U.S. citizens.
